text: Sleepers, Terrorists, Remote Viewing, RITs and the NET Council mandate of Human Genocide. The Zeta-Dracos-Anunnaki force intended to covertly use Psychotronics to “Trigger” specific actions within the ranks of their Illuminati “puppets” in the Interior World Government, to remotely instigate WW3 among Human nations.
